Article Title: After AI-171 crash, drive on to clear Ahmedabad airport of birds, animals
Article Text:
Wreckage of AI-171 outside Ahmedabad airport

Walked Out Of Burning Jet, Now Stranded In UK: AI171 Crash Survivor Vishwaskumar Ramesh Speaks Out

AHMEDABAD: Ahmedabad airport has undertaken a large-scale wildlife management operation to reduce the risk of bird and animal strikes around the airfield, five months after London-bound AI-171 crashed after take-off on June 12, killing all 241 people on board.In association with the forest department, Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport has begun relocating several species of birds and mammals found in and around the premises to areas at least 50–100 km away from the city.Officials said a major translocation drive involving 1,000 large fruit bats is currently underway. The bats, which roost in large numbers near Kotarpur, close to the airport along Sabarmati riverbank, are being captured and released in Polo Forest, a protected habitat about 150 km away.“Giant fruit bats became a particular concern,” said a source. “During night-time inspections, blood stains were often found on the runway or near aircraft, but there would be no feathers, hinting at bat strikes. Following these findings and based on recommendations from the Airports Authority of India (AAI), the decision to translocate certain species was taken during a series of joint review meetings,” added the source.Other species being relocated include the red-wattled lapwing, yellow-wattled lapwing, black kite, Eurasian thick-knee, and blackheaded ibis. Species commonly found around SVPIA — such as the rock pigeon, cattle egret, house crow, Indian roller, and common mynah — continue to be monitored as part of ongoing wildlife hazard management, an official said.
Article Summary: Ahmedabad airport has undertaken a large-scale wildlife management operation to reduce the risk of bird and animal strikes around the airfield. London-bound ai-171 crashed after take-off on june 12, killing all 241 people on board. A major translocation drive involving 1,000 large fruit bats is currently underway.

Article Title: 'Predictable tactic': India calls out Pakistan's 'delirious' leadership over terror claims, says remark to deflect internal power grab
Article Text:
Shehbaz Sharif

Islamabad Court SHAKES After Suicide Car Explosion; Attack Day After Blast In India’s Capital

NEW DELHI: India firmly rejected Pakistan’s accusations regarding the suicide car bombing near Islamabad district court on Tuesday which claimed 12 lives, calling the remarks “baseless and unfounded. ”Responding to media queries on the Pakistani leader’s comments, the ministry of external affairs (MEA) said the allegations were an attempt by Islamabad to divert attention from its domestic political and constitutional crisis.Also read: Islamabad suicide blast: 12 killed after explosion outside Pakistan court, TTP claims responsibility Ministry spokesperson Randhir Jaiswal said, “India unequivocally rejects the baseless and unfounded allegations being made by an obviously delirious Pakistani leadership. It is a predictable tactic by Pakistan to concoct false narratives against India in order to deflect the attention of its own public from the ongoing military-inspired constitutional subversion and power-grab unfolding within the country. ”He added that the international community was well aware of the situation in Pakistan and “will not be misled by Pakistan’s desperate diversionary ploys.”Also read: 'We are in a state of war'; Pakistan minister sounds alarm after suicide bombing kills 12, blames Kabul Earlier, Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif had blamed India for two recent incidents - an attack in Islamabad and another at a cadet college - though he provided no evidence to substantiate the claim.At least 12 people were killed and around 36 others injured after a car exploded near the district and sessions court near G-11 area in Islamabad on Tuesday afternoon.This came just a day after a car explosion took placed near Red Fort Metro Station in Delhi, which claimed 12 lives.
Article Summary: India firmly rejects pakistan’s accusations regarding the suicide car bombing near islamabad district court on tuesday which claimed 12 lives. The ministry of external affairs said the allegations were an attempt by islamabad to divert attention from its domestic political and constitutional crisis.

Article Title: India offers Bhutan Rs 4,000 crore line of credit for hydel units
Article Text:
PM Narendra Modi and Bhutanese king Jigme Khesar Namgyel Wangchuck

‘We Love India’: Bhutan King Reaffirms Ties As PM Modi Unveils Connectivity, Energy Boost

NEW DELHI: PM Narendra Modi and Bhutanese king Jigme Khesar Namgyel Wangchuck jointly inaugurated the 1020MW Punatsangchuu-II hydroelectric project, calling it a milestone in the vibrant and growing mutually beneficial energy partnership between India and Bhutan which has brought significant benefits to the lives of ordinary people in both countries.As PM Modi called on the king during his two-day visit to Bhutan, India announced a concessional line of credit of Rs 4,000 crore for Bhutan to fund energy projects. To promote connectivity, PMModi also said that Gelephu and Samtse in Bhutan will be connected to India's extensive rail network."Once completed, this project will provide Bhutanese industries and farmers with easier access to India's large markets," the Prime Minister said, adding that connectivity creates opportunity and opportunity creates prosperity.The two countries also signed three MoUs in the fields of renewable energy, mental health services, and healthcare to further strengthen bilateral cooperation. The king also conveyed condolences on the loss of lives in the Delhi "tragedy" in the meeting with PM Modi."Along with rail and road connectivity, we are rapidly progressing on border infrastructure," said PM Modi, while endorsing the king's vision of Gelephu Mindfulness City.The PM announced that India would establish an immigration checkpoint near Gelephu to further facilitate viMODIsitors and investors visiting the place.On energy cooperation, PM Modi said Bhutan currently produces 100% of its electricity from renewable energy. "Taking this progress forward, another major step is being taken today. A new hydroelectric project of over 1,000 MW is being launched which will increase Bhutan's hydropower capacity by nearly 40%. In addition, work is also being resumed on another hydroelectric project that has been stalled for a long time," said the PM, adding the progress and prosperity of India and Bhutan are closely linked."In this spirit, last year Govt of India announced a contribution of Rs 10,000 crore to support Bhutan's Five-Year Plan. These funds are being utilized across all sectors - from roads to agriculture, from finance to healthcare, helping improve the ease of living for the people of Bhutan," he said.
Article Summary: Pm narendra modi and bhutanese king jigme khesar namgyel wangchuck jointly inaugurated the 1020mw punatsangchuu-ii hydroelectric project. The two countries also signed three mous in the fields of renewable energy, mental health services, and healthcare. The king also conveyed condolences on the loss of lives in the delhi "tragedy"

Article Title: 'Will deepen bonds of friendship': PM Modi leaves for Bhutan; embarks on two-day visit
Article Text:
PM Modi’s Bhutan Visit Turns Spiritual As Tobgay Calls Him Brother, Nation Awaits Global Prayer

NEW DELHI: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday embarked on a two-day visit to Bhutan's Thimphu. He will join the 70th birthday celebrations of the fourth king, Jigme Singye Wangchuck. PM Modi will meet Bhutan King Jigme Khesar Namgyal Wangchuck, his father and predecessor, the fourth king, as well as Prime Minister Tshering Tobgay."I am confident that my visit will further deepen our bonds of friendship and strengthen our efforts towards shared progress and prosperity," he said before embarking on the visit."It would be my honour to join the people of Bhutan as they mark the 70th birth anniversary of His Majesty the Fourth King," PM Modi added.During the visit, he will participate in the Global Peace Prayer Festival organised by the Royal government of Bhutan.He said that this visit will mark another milestone in the energy partnership with the inauguration of Punatsangchhu-II hydropower project."Our partnership is a key pillar of our Neighbourhood First Policy and a model for exemplary friendly relations between neighbouring countries," PM Modi said.Later in a post on X, he wrote, "Leaving for Bhutan, where I will attend various programmes. This visit comes at a time when Bhutan is marking the 70th birthday of His Majesty the Fourth King.""I will be holding talks with His Majesty the King of Bhutan, His Majesty the Fourth King and Prime Minister Tshering Tobgay," he posted.
Article Summary: Pm modi will meet bhutan king jigme khesar namgyal wangchuck, his father and predecessor, the fourth king, as well as prime minister tshering tobgay. He will participate in the global peace prayer festival organised by the royal government of bhutan.

Article Title: Michael Duarte cause of death: How did the food influencer FoodWithBearHands die
Article Text:
Michael Duarte cause of death: How did the food influencer FoodWithBearHands die (Image via Getty)

What happened to Michael Duarte in Texas?



Who was Michael Duarte, the man behind FoodWithBearHands?



What did Michael Duarte do before the tragic incident?

How is Michael Duarte’s family coping after his death?





Michael Duarte, known online as FoodWithBearHands, passed away on November 8, 2025, in a tragic incident while traveling with his family in Texas. His loved ones confirmed the heartbreaking news through a GoFundMe page, calling it a “horrible incident. ” The exact cause of the accident has not been shared publicly. Michael was loved for his cheerful food videos, kind nature, and family-focused life. His death left millions of fans in shock and grief.Michael Duarte died in Texas on November 8, 2025, while on a family trip, according to a GoFundMe started by his relatives. The fundraiser confirmed that his passing was sudden and tragic but did not share how it happened.Multiple verified outlets, including PEOPLE and TMZ, reported that his family described it only as a “horrible incident.” There has been no official police or medical report released yet.Michael Duarte was a food content creator from California, famous for his hands-on cooking style. He started sharing recipes and BBQ videos on Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube, where he gained over 2 million followers. Fans loved how real and happy he was in his videos.Michael Duarte often cooked for strangers and donated meals to people in need. His agency, Alooma Media Group, called him a loving husband, kind friend, and a creative talent who inspired many.Just a few days before his death, Michael Duarte celebrated his ninth wedding anniversary with his wife Jessica. The couple posted joyful photos online showing their love and togetherness.After that, they traveled to Texas, where the tragic event took place. Reports say it was completely unexpected. Friends and fans across social media have been posting heartfelt messages and tributes remembering his joyful energy and kindness.Michael Duarte leaves behind his wife Jessica and their six-year-old daughter, Oakley. His family started a GoFundMe page to help bring his body home to California and to cover funeral costs.Also Read: Michael Willis Heard Cause Of Death: How Did The TikTok Star Yes King Died Thousands of people have donated, showing how much Michael Duarte meant to them. His fans continue to share his videos and stories online, keeping his memory alive. His family thanked everyone for their love and support during this difficult time.
Article Summary: Michael duarte, known online as foodwithbearhands, passed away on november 8, 2025, in a tragic incident. His loved ones confirmed the heartbreaking news through a gofundme page, calling it a “horrible incident. ” the exact cause of the accident has not been shared publicly.

Article Title: Michael Willis Heard cause of death: How did the TikTok star Yes King died
Article Text:
Michael Willis Heard cause of death: How did the TikTok star Yes King die (Image via Getty)

Who was Michael Willis Heard?

What has been confirmed about Michael Willis Heard death?



Fans react and honor Michael Willis Heard's memory



Remembering Michael Willis Heard's message





Michael Willis Heard, the TikTok creator known as “Yes King,” has passed away. His daughter, Mykel Crumbie, shared the heartbreaking news on November 9, 2025, through an emotional social-media post. Michael Willis Heard was famous for his kind and positive videos, where he encouraged people to love themselves and stay confident. He became a popular TikTok creator through his motivational videos on the account @loveandlighttv. His catchphrases “Yes King” and “Love yourself” made him a fan favorite.Michael Willis Heard was more than a creator, he was also a life coach and pastor-type figure who spoke about self-worth, mental health, and kindness. Some outlets mentioned possible health complications, but these reports are unverified and not confirmed by his family or medical officials.Also Read: Charlie Kirk's Leaked Messages Show Ben Shapiro’s Jealousy Toward YouTuber Candace Owens As Feud Explodes Online After his passing, fans and fellow creators filled TikTok, Instagram, and X (formerly Twitter) with tributes. They shared his famous clips, repeated his catchphrases, and thanked him for spreading positivity.In a recent post, his daughter asked fans to continue remembering her father with kindness and love instead of negativity.Michael Willis Heard’s legacy lives on through his videos and words. Article Title: Mystery deepens around Marshawn Kneeland’s death as new details reveal the truth behind his final hours
Article Text:
Tragic final hours before Marshawn Kneeland’s death reveal heartbreaking details (Getty Images)

Marshawn Kneeland’s final messages before the tragedy





More NFL coverage

The final hours of Dallas Cowboys defensive end Marshawn Kneeland paint a deeply tragic picture of a young life spiraling out of control. The 24-year-old athlete, once celebrated for his explosive power on the field, was found dead from an apparent self-inflicted gunshot wound early Thursday morning, November 6, near a crashed vehicle north of Dallas. His sudden death stunned teammates, fans, and the NFL community who just days earlier had watched him score his first career touchdown on Monday Night Football.According to The Dallas Morning News, Kneeland’s body was discovered in a portable restroom near the intersection of Network Boulevard and Gaylord Parkway in Frisco, Texas. The location was only minutes away from The Star, the Cowboys’ headquarters, and close to the site where his vehicle had crashed along the Dallas Parkway. Investigators said the tragedy unfolded after Kneeland led Texas Department of Public Safety troopers on a brief police chase when he refused to stop for a traffic violation in Addison. Moments later, he collided with a pickup truck near the Dallas Tollway’s access lanes before fleeing on foot. “The driver of the truck was not injured in the accident,” Texas DPS spokesperson Josue De La Cerda told the newspaper.As officers searched the area, authorities began receiving alarming reports suggesting that Marshawn Kneeland was in emotional distress.PEOPLE reported that Kneeland sent a “goodbye” text to his loved ones, prompting his girlfriend, Catalina, to contact police. She warned that he was armed and had a history of mental illness. At nearly the same time, a representative from the NFL called the Plano Police Department with similar information, confirming that multiple agencies were aware of his fragile mental state in the hours leading up to his death.Marshawn Kneeland, a Michigan native and a second-round pick in the 2024 NFL Draft, was known for his quiet confidence and work ethic. His sudden passing triggered an outpouring of grief across the league. On Sunday, November 9, NFL teams across the country - including in Berlin, Germany, where the Indianapolis Colts faced the Atlanta Falcons - observed a moment of silence to honor his memory. His story now stands as a sobering reminder of the unseen struggles many athletes face behind their public glory. Tributes are still pouring for the Cowboys star.
Article Summary: Tragic final hours before marshawn kneeland’s death reveal heartbreaking details. The 24-year-old athlete, once celebrated for his explosive power on the field, was found dead from an apparent self-inflicted gunshot wound. His sudden death stunned teammates, fans, and the nfl community.

Article Title: Kash Patel's foundation behind girlfriend Alexis Wilkins' lawsuits against 'Mossad spy' conspiracy theorists, claims MAGA
Article Text:
Kyle Seraphin claimed Kash Patel's foundation is behind the lawsuits that his girlfriend Alexis Wilkins filed against MAGA influencers for 'Israeli spy' narrative.

Kash Patel’s Jet Scandal Erupts; $60M FBI Plane For Girlfriend’s Show? FBI Chief Slams Critics

3 lawsuits, 3 MAGA voices





Why conspiracy theorists believe Kash Patel's girlfriend is a spy









Kyle Seraphin, Sam Parker and Elijah Schaffer have been sued by Kash Patel 's girlfriend Alexis Wilkins for spreading malicious lies about Alexis that she works for the Israeli spy agency and 'honeytrapped' FBI director Kash Patel. Wilkins sought $5 million from each of them in damages after relentlessly fighting the rumor, claiming she has no connection with Israel. But MAGA has now drawn a line and stood by the conspiracy theorists as they are all MAGA voices, and condemned Wilkins' action against 'freedom of speech'.Though FBI director Patel is not involved with the lawsuits filed by his musician girlfriend, MAGA claimed that Patel's foundation, 'Kash Foundation', is behind the lawsuits. Kyle Seraphin, a former FBI agent who has been targeting Patel and his girlfriend and is one of the recipients of the lawsuit, claimed that the Binnall Law Group, led by Jesse R Binnall, filed the suit. Seraphin claimed that Binnall is also the president of the Kash Foundation, making it clear that Kash Patel, not as the FBI director, but in his personal capacity, is behind the lawsuits.The court filing against Seraphin said he has maliciously lied about Alexis Wilkins, falsely asserting that she—an American-born country singer—is an agent of foreign government, assigned to manipulate and compromise the Director of the FBI.Then, Wilkins filed a lawsuit against Sam Parker, who is also a former US Senate candidate in Utah. “Parker has repeatedly lied about Wilkins, falsely asserting and suggesting that she—an American-born country singer—is an agent of foreign government, assigned to manipulate and compromise the Director of the FBI," the lawsuit against Parker said.The lawsuit against Elijah created a storm as Elijah did not post anything about Patel and Wilkins but shared a post with a photo of them. “Schaffer has perpetuated a malicious lie about Alexis Wilkins, falsely claiming that she—an American-born country singer—is an agent of foreign government, assigned to manipulate and compromise the Director of the FBI," the lawsuit against Schaffer said.MAGA activists expressed their disenchantment with Patel as Candace Owens called for Patel's resignation and called him a "teenager in love" representing the Federal government. "Apparently when governments and people in powerful positions get caught lying, their only weapon is to sue people. It is absolutely pathetic and it’s meant to scare us into silence. “We will bankrupt you!” These people should be treated with contempt," Candace wrote.One of the main reasons behind this conspiracy theory is Alexis' association with PragerU whose CEO is a former Israeli soldier. Alexis Wilkins asserted that she is a presenter on the platform and she had never been to Israel. She is a Christian American born in the US.Another reason behind the conspiracy theory is the age difference between Kash Patel (45) and Wilkins (26). Conspiracy theorists believe Patel has been honeytrapped. But they have been dating since 2023, before Patel became the FBi director.
Article Summary: Kyle seraphin claimed kash patel's foundation is behind the lawsuits that his girlfriend alexis wilkins filed against maga influencers for 'israeli spy' narrative. Wilkins sought $5 million from each of them in damages after relentlessly fighting the rumor, claiming she has no connection with israel.

Article Title: Turkish military plane with 20 aboard catches fire mid-air, crashes in Georgia
Article Text:
Turkish military plane crashes in Georgia (X)

US-Made Turkish C-130 Military Aircraft Bursts Into Flames, Then Explodes Over Georgia; 20 Killed





A Turkish military cargo plane with 20 people on board crashed in Georgia near the Azerbaijani border on Tuesday, authorities from all three countries confirmed, but gave no immediate number of casualties, reported AP.Turkey’s defence ministry said the C-130 aircraft had taken off from Azerbaijan and was returning to Turkey when it went down in Georgia’s Sighnaghi municipality. The ministry said it was not immediately clear how many crew members were on board, according to Euro News.Video footage aired by local media appeared to show the plane spiralling down with a trail of white smoke before crashing. A search and rescue operation has been launched in coordination with Azerbaijani and Georgian authorities.Turkey’s President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan said he was “deeply saddened” by the incident and expressed condolences to the families of those killed. While confirming there were casualties, Erdoğan did not provide further details.Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev also extended condolences to his Turkish counterpart, saying: “We were deeply saddened by the tragic news of the loss of servicemen in the crash of a Turkish Air Force military cargo plane, which took off from Ganja and crashed in Georgian territory.In this moment of sorrow, I share your grief and, on behalf of myself and the people of Azerbaijan, extend heartfelt condolences to you, the families and loved ones of the deceased, and the fraternal people of Türkiye. ”The Georgian interior ministry said the crash occurred near the town of Sighnaghi, close to the Azerbaijani border, and that an investigation has been opened to determine the cause.The C-130E Hercules, a four-engine turboprop tactical airlifter, is widely used by the Turkish armed forces for personnel transport and logistical operations.
Article Summary: Turkish military plane crashes in georgia (x) us-made turkish c-130 military aircraft bursts into flames, then explodes over georgia; 20 killed. Video footage appears to show the plane spiralling down with a trail of white smoke before crashing.

Article Title: 'Kash Patel is a teenager in love': Candace Owens calls for FBI director's ouster as girlfriend sues another MAGA podcaster
Article Text:
Kash Patel's girlfriend Alexis Wilkins has now sued Elijah Schaffer for reposting the 'Mossad spy' conspiracy theory.

Kirk Killing: Candace Owens Accuses FBI Of 'Coverup', Claims Hospital Footage Was 'Seized'

Schaffer calls Wilkins' lawsuit delusional, seeks help from Elon Musk





The post for which Elijah has been sued.

Sued for a repost? MAGA disowns Kash Patel, stands with Elijah









Right-wing podcaster Candace Owens has now called for FBI director Kash Patel's resignation after his girlfriend Alexis Wilkins sued Elijah Schaffer for $5 million. Schaffer, a MAGA podcaster, reposted a thread on the viral conspiracy theory that Wilkins is a Mossad agent and she honeytrapped Kash Patel. Schaffer did not add anything on his part to the viral thread but posted a photo of Patel with his girlfriend.Schaffer became the third MAGA operative to have been sued by Kash Patel's girlfriend -- the other two being Kyle Seraphin, a former FBI agent, and Sam Paker , an influencer. Wilkins repeatedly dismissed these conspiracy theories about her and asserted that she has no connection with Israel, never been there, and she has been dating Kash Patel before Patel became the FBI director.As the conspiracy theory is being churned by MAGA insiders, it is clear that Patel has been isolated inside MAGA. And now, Candace has openly called for Patel's resignation. "Kash Patel has to step down. This is excruciatingly embarrassing. He’s a teenager in love representing the Federal government," Candace said.Responding to the lawsuit in a post on X, Schaffer called it "the legal equivalent of your romantic partner getting mad at you for cheating on her in her dream"."Totally delusional and paranoid legal behavior - still can’t believe Kash is trusted w/ the FBI & sanctioned this stupidity," Schaffer wrote. Schaffer also appealed to Elon Musk for help reminding Musk that he once said he would pay for the legal fees of anyone sued for their free speech posts on X.Elijah Schaffer is where MAGA drew the line and pushed back on Alexis Wilkins' lawsuits. MAGA activists ranted that the FBI director has no real job but to fund his girlfriend's lawsuits against people who share some posts on social media.But Patel made it clear before that he would not allow any attack on his family. In a long post that he recently made, he also hinted that the attacks were coming from supposed allies. “The disgustingly baseless attacks against Alexis — a true patriot and the woman I’m proud to call my partner in life — are beyond pathetic. She is a rock-solid conservative and a country music sensation who has done more for this nation than most will in ten lifetimes. I’m so blessed she’s in my life. Attacking her isn’t just wrong — it’s cowardly and jeopardizes our safety. My love of family will always be my cornerstone, and you will never tear that down or keep me from them," Patel wrote a few days ago.
Article Summary: Elijah schaffer, a maga podcaster, reposted a thread on the viral conspiracy theory that alexis wilkins is a mossad agent and she honeytrapped kash patel. Wilkins repeatedly dismissed these conspiracy theories about her and asserted that she has no connection with israel. Candace owens has openly called for patel's resignation.

Viewers linked the moment to Travis Kelce’s engagement to Taylor Swift and upcoming wedding reports. Article Title: Antonio Brown’s legal nightmare deepens with shocking Miami comeback and new mugshot reveal
Article Text:
Antonio Brown returns to Miami to face attempted murder charges (Getty Images)

Antonio Brown pleads not guilty, claims self-defense



More NFL coverage

Antonio Brown is back in Miami -- and this time, it’s not for football. The former NFL star has officially returned to South Florida to face attempted murder charges stemming from a May 2025 incident at a boxing event. Brown, who was detained in Dubai last week and extradited through New York, was seen walking off a private jet in Miami wearing a blue jacket, as captured in a video shared by Andy Slater of Fox Sports 640. Hours later, Brown was booked into the Turner Guilford Knight Correctional Center, where he posed for a new mugshot.His return marks the latest chapter in a months-long legal saga that began when an arrest warrant was issued earlier this year. Brown, 37, reportedly fled the country before being taken into custody in Dubai. After telling a New Jersey judge he would not contest extradition, Brown was flown back to face charges that could carry a prison sentence of up to 15 years if convicted.Brown’s attorney, Mark Eiglarsh, filed a not guilty plea on his client’s behalf, maintaining that the former wide receiver acted lawfully. According to Eiglarsh, the altercation at the Adin Ross boxing event erupted when Brown was confronted by former friend Zul-Qarnain Kwame Nantambu.The encounter allegedly turned violent before Brown fired shots, an act his defense insists was driven by fear and self-preservation.“Brown was attacked that night and acted within his legal right to protect himself from an individual who had previously committed criminal acts against him,” Eiglarsh said. “The actions he was forced to take were solely in self-defense against the alleged victim's violent behavior. It's a privilege to represent him, and I am determined to ensure that justice is served.”As Brown awaits his first court appearance in Miami, questions remain about whether Florida’s “stand your ground” law will factor into his defense. Legal experts say the case could hinge on whether Brown reasonably believed his life was in danger during the altercation.For now, Antonio Brown faces the possibility of bond restrictions or even house arrest as the court determines the next steps. His once-celebrated football career now stands overshadowed by a courtroom battle that could define his future far more than any game ever did.
Article Summary: Antonio brown returns to miami to face attempted murder charges. Brown was detained in dubai last week and extradited through new york. Brown's attorney, mark eiglarsh, filed a not guilty plea on his client’s behalf.

Article Title: Are tensions rising ahead of Taylor Swift’s wedding? Inside the private guest list rumors swirling around the couple
Article Text:
Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's 2026 wedding plans are reportedly excluding longtime friends Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds. Sources suggest Swift desires a drama-free celebration, potentially due to Lively's past association with a sexual assault case. Despite hints of a wider guest list, the couple prioritizes authenticity and peace for their upcoming nuptials.

Taylor Swift’s inner circle may look very different when she walks down the aisle

More coverage on NFL:

Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce’s engagement has dominated headlines, but the excitement surrounding their upcoming wedding now comes with a dose of drama. The pop megastar and the Kansas City Chiefs tight end, who got engaged before the 2025 NFL season, are reportedly finalizing plans for a 2026 ceremony, one that’s already drawing attention for who won’t be there.According to multiple reports, longtime friends Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds might not make the guest list. The surprising exclusion comes after years of public closeness between the two couples, leaving fans stunned. As Swift focuses on peace and privacy, speculation grows about whether the alleged rift is personal, professional, or both.As planning continues, Kelce remains ecstatic about the engagement, expressing his joy on New Heights. “Exciting, it’s been awesome,” he said. “It’s been so much fun hearing from everybody, seeing the internet go crazy. I still get giddy. It’s been really fun telling everybody who I’m going to be spending the rest of my life with.”Swift, meanwhile, has reportedly handpicked her inner circle for the big day, including Selena Gomez and Gigi Hadid as bridesmaids. However, reports from Yahoo and TheSpun claim that Swift has no plans to invite Lively and Reynolds, once considered part of her “chosen family.”Sources allege that Swift distanced herself after Lively’s name surfaced in relation to Justin Baldoni’s sexual assault case, which briefly mentioned the singer.“Taylor wants zero drama. Sadly, that means Blake’s out,” one insider told Rob Shuter. The news reportedly left Lively and Reynolds “shocked but resigned,” especially considering Swift’s history with the couple, she even used the names of their daughters, James, Inez, and Betty, in her Folklore album.Despite rumors of a smaller, more intimate ceremony, Swift recently hinted she might extend her invitations widely, saying she would invite “anyone I ever talked to.” Still, insiders insist the couple’s focus remains on authenticity, love, and a celebration free from controversy.As Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce prepare for their 2026 wedding, one thing is clear, the singer is prioritizing peace over politics, surrounding herself only with those who truly support her next chapter as Mrs. Kelce.
Article Summary: Taylor swift and travis kelce's 2026 wedding plans are reportedly excluding longtime friends blake lively and ryan reynolds. Sources suggest swift desires a drama-free celebration, potentially due to lively's past association with a sexual assault case. The couple prioritizes authenticity and peace for their upcoming nuptials.

Article Title: Nikki Haley's son says Indians should not be shocked that he wants them out of America and an H-1B ban: 'My loyalty is to US'
Article Text:
Indian-origin Nalin Haley's son Nikki Haley says it's not surprising that he wants H-1B to be banned because his loyalty is to America.

Big Relief For Indians: Donald Trump Clarifies $100K H-1B Fee Won’t Apply To Existing Visa Holders





Indian-origin Nikki Haley's son Nalin Haley , in his first Fox interview, said that people should not be shocked that he wants Indians out of the country as his loyalty, despite his roots in India, is to America. The 24-year-old son of the former governor of South Carolina recently created a stir because of his extreme views that the US should ban legal immigration as well. He also made news for trashing Republicans like Vivek Ramaswamy, for asserting that MAGA can't rise above religion, as the GOP cares about religion.Speaking about the 'anxiety' of his generation, Nalin Haley said graduates who are around his age have six figures in debt and have not got jobs. He said none of his friends has got a job even after a year and a half after graduation with good degrees. Those who have jobs are employed temporarily or doing jobs that don't require a degree. He said he does pretty well but can't envision buying a house in future."This isn't normalcy. The American Dream is becoming less and less attainable with each passing day," Haley said.America is now prioritizing foreign workers who are coming and taking American jobs, Haley said, adding that companies which are not prioritizing Americans should be punished.Haley was told that his stand on H-1B is surprising to many as he is an Indian-American and H-1B facilitates a lot of indians in US job sectors."They shouldn't be because I have seen how it has affected my friends and those around me. At the end of the day, my loyalty is to America and that's part of assimilation," he said blaming former president Barack Obama for immigrants coming to America and not assimilating."What we saw with Obama is that we had a lot of immigrants coming here and the thought was that you don't need to change, you don't need to have your loyalty, you could be who you are. No, you need to assimilate. You need to act like an American and support American values and support American workers and American people. We should absolutely ban H-1B," Haley said.
Article Summary: Indian-origin nalin haley's son nikki haley says it's not surprising that he wants h-1b to be banned because his loyalty is to america. The 24-year-old son of the former governor of south carolina recently created a stir because of his extreme views.

Article Title: ‘I’m not sure…’: Donald Trump’s awkward NFL booth moment sends viewers searching for his stats
Article Text:
Donald Trump speaks with the Fox NFL broadcast team during the Commanders loss to the Lions on Nov. 9. (Images via Getty and FOX)

Donald Trump experiences boos, mixed reactions and on-field responsibilities in a high profile Commanders game appearance

Tom Brady’s quarterback advice resurfaces as Donald Trump revisits his early football memories

Donald Trump went on the Fox NFL broadcast during the Detroit Lions win over the Washington Commanders on Nov. 9, and the moment was supposed to be soft and nostalgic. It did not stay that way. Analyst Jonathan Vilma asked the president how many touchdowns he scored at New York Military Academy, and Donald Trump admitted, “I’m not sure I had any.” That single line immediately became the most talked about moment of the visit and gave the Fox booth a rare unfiltered reaction from a president who usually avoids openings like this.Fox showed an old black and white team photo of Donald Trump wearing No. 85 while he talked about playing tight end in the late 1950s and early 1960s. Donald Trump explained that his quarterback could only throw about ten yards and said, “I would say ten yards was a long pass.” He told the crew he loved playing the sport and repeated that he “never tells a lie” when the topic of touchdowns came up again. The moment felt light from his side, but the hesitation made the clip travel everywhere within minutes.Donald Trump became the first sitting president to attend a regular season NFL game since Jimmy Carter in 1978.He arrived after the first quarter of the Washington Commanders loss to the Detroit Lions and the stadium cameras caught him in his suite with House Speaker Mike Johnson. The crowd reacted loudly and not in his favor.The boos continued at halftime when Donald Trump read the Oath of Enlistment during an on-field ceremony for new military recruits. He left before the end of a game where the Commanders dropped to 3-7.During the same Fox NFL segment, Donald Trump brought up a moment involving Tom Brady. He told the crew that the seven time Super Bowl winner once gave him quarterback advice, saying, “You’ve got to put it in their hands.” Donald Trump added that Tom Brady told him quarterbacks need to help receivers instead of firing the ball without feel. Jonathan Vilma laughed and said Brady was “pretty good,” and the exchange added a second viral clip to the booth hit list.Donald Trump also touched on the Washington Commanders stadium project. ESPN reported on Nov. 8 that the president communicated through an intermediary about having his name attached to the new stadium, a project estimated at nearly four billion dollars. On the broadcast he said, “They’re going to build a beautiful stadium. That is what I am involved in. We are getting all the approvals and everything else.”The game was another stop in his long run of sports appearances this year. He attended the U.S. Open, a Yankees game and the FIFA World Cup final. At Sunday’s game, Detroit Lions wide receiver Amon Ra St. Brown even performed the “Trump dance” after his touchdown celebration. Detroit Lions quarterback Jared Goff said he noticed the low Air Force One flyover earlier in the day.
Article Summary: Donald trump became the first sitting president to attend a regular season nfl game since jimmy carter in 1978. The crowd reacted loudly and not in his favor when he read the oath of enlistment during an on-field ceremony for new military recruits. Donald trump also touched on the washington commanders stadium project.

Article Title: Billionaire Barry Sternlicht says Mamdani will turn New York City into Mumbai, his team considering leaving
Article Text:
Billionaire real estate investor Barry Sternlicht said New York will turn into Mumbai under Zohran Mamdani's administration.

‘Deport Him…’: Team Trump Moves To Strip Mamdani Of US Citizenship After NYC Win

New York will survive, but will get worse before it gets better







Billionaire real estate investor Barry Sternlicht, the chairman and CEO of Starwood Capital Group, said New York City under new mayor Zohran Mamdani will turn into Mumbai as he pledged to freeze rents because tenants' incomes have stagnated. Sternlicht who has both commercial and residential holdings in NYC said when one neighbor finds out that their neighbor is not paying, they stop paying and thus NYC will turn into Mumbai.“Over $100 million, every project in New York has to go union, and it’s super expensive. It leads to extremely expensive housing. And other developers have tried to cut deals with the unions, but they rule New York, and that’s one of the key reasons the blue states are so expensive and they’re so difficult to add supply of housing to,” Sternlicht said in an interview with CNBC Property Play, reacting to Mamdani's win.“And then the far left gets really nuts and says the tenants don’t have to pay. Well, you can’t kick them out if they don’t pay. So the neighbor finds out the neighbor isn’t paying, and they don’t pay, and the next guy doesn’t pay, and then you’re basically going to turn New York City into Mumbai," he said.Sternlicht said his New York team is considering leaving the city as well.“The core issues are not what he’s focusing on. We need to increase housing.That’s not going to happen easily, right? You need serious subsidies from the government if they want us to work with unions. The unions have to be more accommodative on their work laws and the wages and everything else, otherwise you can’t add economically," he said. Sternlicht said rent freezing is not the solution but increasing housing is.Sternlicht said he believed New York will survive but will first gets a lot worse before it gets better. “People are working really hard. Just how do we help others to do well and believe in the American dream? That’s probably a better message for a leader in the city than saying, let’s just tax everyone who’s been successful, force them to leave and then have to rely on Washington for handouts to basically keep the city going,” Sternlicht added.
Article Summary: Billionaire real estate investor barry sternlicht said new york will turn into mumbai under new mayor zohran mamdani's administration. He said rent freezing is not the solution but increasing housing is. “people are working really hard. Just how do we help others to do well and believe in the american dream?

Article Title: Destiny makes explosive allegation against HasanAbi involving a minor girl during Berlin trip
Article Text:
Image Via Instagram

“If Hasan is going to reach this hard to say that I kickstarted Fuentes’ career, then I am responsible for his career 10x over.

Also, Hasan f*cked a 15 year old when he was visiting that brothel in Berlin, that's why he doesn’t like to talk about it as much now.”

Destiny’s allegation over HasanAbi’s Berlin trip sparks intense online reaction



“serious”

“shocking.”

“It’s common knowledge behind the scenes. If Hasan wants to contest it, he can sue me, but he won’t because truth is an absolute defense against defamation.”





Online streamer Steven Kenneth Bonnell II, better known as Destiny, has once again ignited controversy by making a serious allegation against fellow streamer Hasan Piker, known online as HasanAbi. The claim came shortly after a heated exchange between the two, following Hasan’s remarks about Destiny’s past association with far-right figure Nick Fuentes. In a viral post on X (formerly Twitter), Destiny responded by accusing HasanAbi of inappropriate conduct involving a girl during a visit to Berlin, an accusation that immediately spread across social platforms and streaming communities.The post, which quickly garnered thousands of reactions, quoted Destiny saying:The intensity of Destiny’s statement immediately reignited old tensions between the two, drawing widespread attention from viewers and fellow creators.The allegation surfaced after HasanAbi discussed Nick Fuentes during a recent livestream, where he said he had long avoided covering the controversial political commentator to prevent amplifying extremist voices. Hasan added that figures like Destiny helped give Fuentes a platform through debates and exposure, prompting Destiny’s strong reaction online. Following Destiny’s post, users on X called the accusationandDestiny replied to one comment, stating,HasanAbi has previously acknowledged visiting a Berlin brothel years ago but has never mentioned anything resembling the claims made by Destiny. No credible evidence has emerged to support the allegation, and it currently remains unverified speculation circulating on social media.The feud between Destiny and HasanAbi has now escalated into one of the most heated controversies in the streaming world, with the community divided over the nature and validity of the claims. Until HasanAbi addresses the accusation or further proof emerges, the situation remains speculative highlighting how personal conflicts between high-profile creators can rapidly spiral into public drama.Also Read: xQc defends Sydney Sweeney over “great genes” comment, says outrage is pointless
Article Summary: Online streamer steven kenneth bonnell ii, better known as destiny, has ignited controversy by making a serious allegation against fellow streamer hasan piker, known online as hasanabi. The claim came shortly after a heated exchange between the two, following hasan’s remarks about destiny's past association with far-right figure nick fuentes.

Article Text:

Decode the challenge: Smart strategies to solve Wordle in six moves

Objective: Identify the secret five-letter word in six attempts.

First move: Begin with a word that includes common vowels and consonants to uncover key letters early.

Enter a guess: Type any valid five-letter word and submit it.

Review clues: Green indicates the correct letter in the right position, yellow shows the correct letter in the wrong position, and grey means the letter is not in the word.

Strategy tip: Use the feedback from each guess to narrow down possible words.

Avoid mistakes: Exclude letters that have already been ruled out.

Final goal: Solve the word within six guesses before your attempts run out.

Wordle hints and clues for today’s puzzle



Starting Letter: Today’s Wordle answer starts with the letter “G”.

Vowels: The answer contains two vowels. Correctly guessing them can help solve Wordle faster.

GIZMO

Meaning of Gizmo

Article Title: Tesla CEO Elon Musk reveals three things he had when he moved to Canada: ‘$2500, one bag of clothes and …’
Article Text: Elon Musk revealed he arrived in Montreal at 17 with only $2500, a bag of clothes, and books. This statement followed criticism from author Joyce Carol Oates regarding his perceived lack of cultural engagement. Musk also defended his Tesla compensation, linking it to the company's growth and shareholder votes.

Article Title: Markets watch: Asian stocks gain on US budget deal hopes; crude steadies on demand outlook
Article Text:
File photo (Picture credit: AP)





Asian equities edged higher on Wednesday following signs that the US government shutdown could end soon and amid data pointing to a cooling jobs market, which has raised expectations of a Federal Reserve interest rate cut.Markets, however, remain cautious on technology stocks after a year of strong AI-driven gains.In early Asian trade, major indices rose, with Tokyo’s Nikkei 225 up 0.2% at 50,927, Hong Kong’s Hang Seng climbing 1.1% to 26,984, and Shanghai’s Composite adding 0.3% to 4,015, as per news agency AFP.Despite the overall positive trend, technology stocks faced pressure after Japanese investor SoftBank sold its entire stake in US chipmaker Nvidia for $5.8 billion, leading to a 3% drop in Nvidia shares and a 10% fall in SoftBank’s Tokyo listing.After the Senate approved a temporary spending bill, the US House of Representatives is set to vote, with President Donald Trump expected to sign the legislation, potentially reopening government services as early as Friday.The shutdown, which began on October 1, left a million federal workers unpaid and delayed key economic data, complicating the Fed’s policy decisions.Private payroll data from ADP showed US companies shed an average of 11,250 jobs per week in the four weeks ending October 25, highlighting weakness in the labour market and increasing bets on a Fed rate cut in December, reported Bloomberg.Outplacement firm Challenger, Gray & Christmas also reported that October saw the highest level of layoffs in 22 years.Oil prices were largely steady, following gains in the previous session, as traders weighed potential demand increases from a reopening of the US government.Brent crude slipped 8 cents to $65.08 a barrel, while US West Texas Intermediate fell 7 cents to $60.97, reported Reuters.Analysts noted that restoring government operations could boost consumer confidence, travel, and jet fuel demand ahead of the holiday season.On the supply side, US sanctions on Russian oil producers, including Lukoil and Rosneft, continue to influence global markets, prompting some Chinese refiners to seek non-Russian crude and schedule maintenance disruptions, according to Reuters.Currency and bond markets reflected cautious optimism. The euro dipped to $1.1579, the pound fell to $1.3143, and the dollar strengthened against the yen to 154.37, while US 10-year Treasury yields fell to 4.08% on expectations of looser monetary policy, as per Bloomberg.Asian investors are now monitoring the House vote in Washington closely, with a potential government reopening seen as a key catalyst for equities and crude demand in the near term.
Article Summary: Tokyo's nikkei 225 up 0.2% at 50,927, hong kong's hang seng climbs 1.1% to 26,984. Shanghai's composite adds 0.3% to 4,015. Us house of representatives set to vote on temporary spending bill. President donald trump expected to sign legislation, potentially reopening government services.
